title: Quetico
creator_credit: Canadian Film Institute and Christopher Chapman
brief_description: Quetico Provincial Park in Ontario, an area of over a million acres of unspoiled wilderness, is being preserved as canoe country for present and future generations. The area is as wild and natural today as it was in the 17th century when explorer, trader and voyager passed through in search of furs and discovery.
